name: @promptfoo/code-scan-action
description: GitHub Action for scanning PRs with promptfoo code-scan

scripts.build: esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.js --sourcemap --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.package: npm run build && git add dist/
scripts.test: echo "Action tests run via parent jest config" && exit 0
scripts.dev: npm run build && act pull_request -W .github/workflows/test-scan.yml -e .github/workflows/test-event.json --container-architecture linux/amd64
